title: alecfisker
author: alecfisker
content: Have unused laptop, it could make $1 per month running proof of stake coin node.Minimal requirements 2 Gb ram, 10Gb free drive space, 5% of CPU power.Text me for install instruction, payment in bitcoin.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: A laptop costs more than $1 per month in power. Make it $2, pay a year ahead, and you have a few VPS options.I wouldn't install unknown software on my home network. For all I know you'll use it for very bad things.
